text: The Lady with the Dog () is a 1960 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits.В Петербурге пассажирам автобусов начали показывать старые фильмыДАМА С СОБАЧКОЙ It stars Iya Savvina, Aleksey Batalov, and Nina Alisova. ==Actors== * Iya Savvina as Anna Sergeyevna * Aleksey Batalov as Dimitri Gurov * Nina Alisova as Madame Gurov * Pantelejmon Krymov as von Didenitz * Yuri Medvedev * Vladimir Erenberg == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1960 drama movies Category:Ukrainian movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies set in Ukraine Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Lady with the Dog (movie)
